channel.title: Running server errors that d/c you, laggs, or crashes the server
channel.description:
I've been getting horrible errors that come up in my cmd while running my server. They sometimes d/c the person that did it, sometimes it creates nulls and lags the server and sometimes it gets an error and lags everyone so bad that even tho the runserver.bat is up and running, you can't log on. Its horrible because it seems like I have to sit on my computer and babysit the server to restart it if it gets errors. And it will (I usually have to reboot my whole computer about 3-4 times a day because of these errors). Sometimes I know the cause of it, other times I don't, it sometimes just errors up for no reason. Anyways if anyone could just tell me what they mean, or how to fix it, or just any tips or hints or help at all, it would be Greatly apreciated. :) Here's the errors
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2688 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23334) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17959) at client.packetSending(client.java:17912) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExecption: -35 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19265) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17959) at client.packetSending(client.java:17912) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4952 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23334) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17959) at client.packetSending(client.java:17912) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1960 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21192) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17968) at client.packetSending(client.java:17921) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -24 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19274) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17968) at client.packetSending(client.java:17921) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -24 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19274) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17968) at client.packetSending(client.java:17921) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This one was caused by fire blast. Only if you use against a player in a pk zone.
java.lang.NullPointerException at client.stillgfxz2(client.java:5370) at client.stillgfxz(client.java:5362) at client.firespell(client.java:5493) at GraphicsHandler.createSpell(GraphicsHandler.java:87) at client.ProjectileSpellPlayer(client.java:5725) at client.AttackMage(client.java:27985) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21211) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17698) at client.packetSending(client.java:17921) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
So please give me anything you got. :D Thanks in advance. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2009, 03:46:40 pm[/size][hr]In case you didn't see the last one only happens when someone uses a fire blast spell against a player in the wild or a pk zone. Not against regular npcs at train. plz help with some of these. :)

item.title: Running server errors that d/c you, laggs, or crashes the server
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

I know this is sososososso old, but I’m getting these errors now. Came out of nowhere.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 26, 2009, 08:02:55 am[/size][hr]I think it may be a corrupted packet…but I have no clue. Any help anybody?

Read full topic
item.source: Running server errors that d/c you, laggs, or crashes the server

item.title: Running server errors that d/c you, laggs, or crashes the server
item.dc:creator: @nubra nubra
item.description:
@nubra wrote:

I’ve been getting horrible errors that come up in my cmd while running my server. They sometimes d/c the person that did it, sometimes it creates nulls and lags the server and sometimes it gets an error and lags everyone so bad that even tho the runserver.bat is up and running, you can’t log on. Its horrible because it seems like I have to sit on my computer and babysit the server to restart it if it gets errors. And it will (I usually have to reboot my whole computer about 3-4 times a day because of these errors). Sometimes I know the cause of it, other times I don’t, it sometimes just errors up for no reason. Anyways if anyone could just tell me what they mean, or how to fix it, or just any tips or hints or help at all, it would be Greatly apreciated. Here’s the errors

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2688
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23334)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:17959)
at client.packetSending(client.java:17912)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
at server.main(server.java:49)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception


java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExecption: -35
	at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19265)

	at client.packetSending(client.java:17912)
	at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
	at server.main(server.java:49)

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4952
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23334)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:17959)
at client.packetSending(client.java:17912)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
at server.main(server.java:49)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception


java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1960
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21192)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:17968)
        at client.packetSending(client.java:17921)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
        at server.main(server.java:49)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -24
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19274)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:17968)
        at client.packetSending(client.java:17921)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
        at server.main(server.java:49)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -24
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19274)

at client.packetSending(client.java:17921)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
at server.main(server.java:49)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception

This one was caused by fire blast. Only if you use against a player in a pk zone.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at client.stillgfxz2(client.java:5370)
	at client.stillgfxz(client.java:5362)
	at client.firespell(client.java:5493)

	at client.AttackMage(client.java:27985)
	at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21211)

	at client.packetSending(client.java:17921)
	at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
	at server.main(server.java:49)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception


So please give me anything you got.  :D   Thanks in advance.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2009, 03:46:40 pm[/size][hr]In case you didn't see the last one only happens when someone uses a fire blast spell against a player in the wild or a pk zone. Not against regular npcs at train. plz help with some of these.  :)
